title: CID grills Namal over May 9 incidents
body_lines: The Criminal Investigations Department (CID) is currently recording a statement from SLPP  MP Namal Rajapaksa over the incidents at Kollupitiya and Galle Face Green on May 9.
The CID yesterday also recorded statements for nearly five hours from MPs Indika Anurudda, Pavithra Wanniarachchi and her husband Kanchana Jayaratne over the same incidents.
